WebLink.url: {! IF(!ISBLANK( Opportunity.Bid_Number__c ), URLFOR( Opportunity.Bid_portal_URL__c ,null), URLFOR(IF( Opportunity.Owner_Country__c = 'Sweden', ('https://steria.sharepoint.com/sites/BidPortal_SE/'+Opportunity.Bid_Number__c), ('https://steria.sharepoint.com/sites/intra_sc_tilbud/'+Opportunity.Bid_Number__c )))) }
